external_games.name: Omerta: City of Gangsters Gold Edition

name: Omerta: City of Gangsters Gold Edition
summary:
The complete collection of tactical gangster simulator, and all its DLCs.

You play the role of an immigrant newly entering a colorful part of New Jersey with little more than big dreams, the player will scale up the criminal hierarchy of 1920’s Atlantic City. Starting with small jobs, their character will recruit a gang and to expand their empire claim territory from other gangsters. Eventually establishing their own crime syndicate and becoming crime lord of Atlantic City.

Players will be able to spot Atlantic City landmarks, engage tactical turn-based combat, plan covert missions to gather intel, manage several unique player controlled characters and customize them utilizing RPG features, all while exploring more than 20 maps.
